title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio site built with React, Vite, and SCSS, featuring a blog, testimonials, and 3D models.

title: E-Commerce Dashboard
description: A dashboard for managing products, orders, and analytics, with a focus on UX and performance.

title: Weather App
description: A sleek weather forecasting app with real-time data and animated backgrounds.

title: Task Manager
description: A productivity tool for managing daily tasks, deadlines, and reminders.

title: Blog Platform
description: A full-featured blogging platform with markdown support and user authentication.

title: Finance Tracker
description: Track expenses, set budgets, and visualize spending trends with interactive charts.

title: Recipe Finder
description: Discover recipes by ingredients, save favorites, and generate shopping lists.

title: Fitness App
description: A fitness tracking app with workout plans, progress charts, and social features.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat app with group messaging, emojis, and notifications.

title: Crypto Dashboard
description: Monitor cryptocurrency prices, news, and portfolio performance in real time.

title: Travel Journal
description: Share travel stories, photos, and tips with an interactive map view.

title: Online Learning Platform
description: A platform for online courses, quizzes, and progress tracking.

title: Movie Database
description: Browse movies, view ratings, and create watchlists with a modern UI.

title: Portfolio Analytics
description: Analyze your investment portfolio with advanced charts and insights.

title: Event Planner
description: Plan and manage events, send invites, and track RSVPs easily.
